bibl.title: Sales of Land in their Social Context.
bibl.note: "The actual mobility of land was more circumscribed than at first appears from the number of sale documents which have survived, and I doubt that there was ever an opportunity for widespread investment purchase of private land."

bibl.title: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Rowlandson Jane L., Sales of Land in their Social Context.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 371-378.

"The actual mobility of land was more circumscribed than at first appears from the number of sale documents which have survived, and I doubt that there was ever an opportunity for widespread investment purchase of private land."
